name: inertial
content:

caused by, using, or relating to inertia (= the physical force that keeps something in the same position or moving in the same direction): His injuries were caused by inertial forces during the car crash.
More examplesFewer examples The inertial mass of an object is its tendency to resist changes in velocity.The company makes inertial sensors for robots.Inertial energy is stored and then reused.Calculate the total inertial load on the motor.
